about-description-1: I'm passionate about creating things. No matter whether as a Developer, or Project Manager. In my work, I belive in team and interactions, because when we are united we can easily ship products.
about-description-2: I code step by step, from one version to another. Just like in Scrum methodology. I'm studing at Wrocław University of Technology at the Bachelor's program of Systems Engineering.
about-description-3: Besides IT I love fantasy books and computer games from strategy genre and RPG's from the polish game studio CD Projekt Red.
wmsdev-description-1: Active programmer, Project Manager and co-president of the WMS_DEV scientific club at Wrocław University of Technology.
wmsdev-description-2: We create web applications for the student community, all based on Scrum and market-leading technologies.
portfolio-description-0: I proudly presents a few of my projects. Each of them is a result of my or my team's work.
portfolio-description-1: Click on the organisation icons to learn more about them.
kalkulacja-straczkowe-description-0: Economic calculation, where we subtract costs from potential profits.
kalkulacja-straczkowe-description-1: In addition to profits from the harvest, we add subsidies and ecological schemes with exclusion systems.
kalkulacja-straczkowe-description-2: The costs section includes about a dozen recurring items.
